name: VEKTA
longDesc: VEKTA is an open source procedurally generated infinite universe exploration game. Interact with NPCs and find new planets. Plenty of features are planned on being added soon. I designed the UI and created the physics for this game, among other things.

name: Better Clairvoyance
longDesc: I was tired of all the ugly login screens for Linux, so I customized an SDDM theme based on my needs and aesthetic choices.

name: Cygnus
longDesc: Cygnus is a color theme for iTerm2, Firefox, and YouTube.

name: Muse File Manager
longDesc: Muse was created as a way for me to organize my notes in college through tagging, file descriptions, and color coding.
